back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Guardian cards ([rogue]) level 0-2, Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-2, Neutral cards level 0-5, [[Melee]] cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Roukanken, Hakurouken, Mini-Hakkero, Phasmaphobia, 1 random basic weakness.
flavor: Those abominations that cannot be cut by my Roukanken, forced by youkai... Are next to none!
name: Youmu Konpaku
text:
[reaction] After you active a fight ability on a [[Melee]] asset: Take a fight action using a different[[Melee]] asset you control. (Limit once per phase.)
[elder_sign] effect: +2.If you succeed, you may immediately take a fight action on a [[Melee]] asset you control.

name: Roukanken
subname: Two Hundred Yojana in One Slash
text: [[action]] If Roukanken is ready: Fight. You get +2 combat for this attack. If you succeed, you may exhaust Roukanken to do +1 damage for this attack. Then, if this attack defeated an enemy, you may deal 1 damage to another enemy at your location.

name: Hakurouken
text:
[[action]] Fight. You get +2 combat for this attack. If this attack defeats an enemy, you may either (choose one)
Heal 1 horror from and investigator or [[Ally]] at your location.
Discard a [[Terror]] card from the treat area on an investigator at your location.

name: Phasmaphobia
text: Revelation Discard each asset you control that takes up a hand slot. If you are engaged with any enemies, choose one of those enemies and take direct horror equal to it's horror value. If no cards were discarded by this effect, shuffle Phasmaphobia into your deck.

back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, Mystic [[Spell]] cards([mystic]) level 0-3, Mystic [[Item]] cards([mystic]) level 0-1. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Magical Mimicry, Mini-Hakkero, Flying Blind, 1 random basic weakness.
flavor: It ain't magic if it ain't flashy.
name: Marisa Kirisame
text:
[reaction] After a level 0-3 [[Spell]] or [[Tome]] card is placed in its owner's discard pile, if there are fewer than 5 cards beneath Marisa Kirisame: Pay the printed resource cost of that card. Then, place it beneath Marisa Kirisame. If you paid at least 3 resources, gain 1 resource. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +0. Choose a level 0-3 [[Spell]] card in the discard pile of an investigator at your location. Place it beneath Marisa Kirisame.
